page.title: 12Bracknell Leisure Census
page.content: The children did a census of what people in Bracknell did in their spare time.We interviewed people in different age groups with the following results.One interesting fact was that nobody over 60 whom we interviewed took part in any active sport. {Active sports popularity poll {Ages 1st 2nd 3rd 4th 5+ Football Swimming Cricket Running 12+ Swimming Football Running Golf 17+ Football Running Squash Archery 22+ Swimming Badminton Tennis Golf 60+ NIL { Spectator sports popularity poll 5+ Football Skating Swimming 12+ Football Tennis Basketball 17+ Football VARIOUS 22+ Football Tennis Snooker 60+ Snooker VARIOUS
